channel.title: GCP on jdhao's digital space
channel.description: Recent content in GCP on jdhao's digital space

item.title: Retry for Google Cloud Client
item.description: When we use one of the google cloud python clients to communicate with GCP, there may be errors occurring sometime calling the client API methods.

item.title: Make Python logging Work in GCP
item.description: When deploying a Python application to GCP Kuberntes Engine, we may see issues that the logging level is not correct in the cloud logging explorer. In order for the Python logging package to work with GCP, we need some additional configurations.

item.title: Liveness and Readiness Check in Kubernetes
Google Cloud Storage Usage
item.description: Some notes on using the Google Cloud storage.

item.title: How to Download Files from Google Cloud Storage in the Databricks Workspace Notebook
item.description: In this post, I want to share the complete process and setup to download files from GCP in a Databricks workspace notebook. Since the notebook itself is non-interactive when you run the shell command, the setup process is a bit different from the normal GCP authentication.
